subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: Mercedes GP Petronas Formula One Team
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton, driving a Mercedes car, won the British Grand Prix at Silverstone, England, on Sunday in the most unpredictable and tightly fought race of the year.
snippet: Lewis Hamilton, driving a Mercedes car, won the British Grand Prix at Silverstone, England, on Sunday in the most unpredictable and tightly fought race of the year.
